AboutAngels.title: About angels
AboutAngels.explanation1: Angels are users who are willing to help you pay certain expenses
AboutAngels.explanation2: Try to write a request with a clear purpose
AboutAngels.explanation3: Once you receive an angel's help, you should provide them with a receipt or proof of payment.
AboutAngels.explanation4: Angels will give you a review, once you complete your expense.

AskForAngel.angelDescription: Share your request with angels who can help you pay your expense
